"Compound Techniques":
"Compound Techniques are special attacks that can be performed with Force and Techter weapons.

To use them, you must first learn the Force or Techter Class Skill \"United Technique\". No Skill Points are needed to learn this Class Skill."

"There are three types of Compound Technique: Fomelgion, Barantsion and Zandion. All three cost a stock of the Compound Technique gauge to use.

The Compound Technique gauge fills as you hit enemies with Techniques and Tech Explosions."
"Compound Technique damage is not affected by enemy Attribute weaknesses, or by Class Skills that apply to Techniques."
